name: Necken
description: Explore, collect resources and craft your way through the roguelite forest. Battle mystical creatures from Swedish folk lore, and reach Necken, the creature known for drowning everyone who meets him.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: 1.6Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
